H0.text: Brown, American Rainbow and Cutthroat are all types of which fish. Salmon

H1.text: Brown, American Rainbow and Cutthroat are all types of which fish. Bass

H2.text: Brown, American Rainbow and Cutthroat are all types of which fish. Char

H3.text: Brown, American Rainbow and Cutthroat are all types of which fish. Trout

A4.text: The name 'trout' is commonly used for many species in three of the seven genera, including Salmo (Brown trout), Oncorhynchus (Rainbow and Cutthroat trout), and Salvelinus (Lake trout).

A5.text: Brook trout and three other extant species of North American trout, despite the names, are actually char (or charr), which are salmonids also closely related to trout and salmon.
